title: Sampler, 1782
medium:
Medium: silk and metal wrapped-silk thread embroidery, silk foundation
Technique: satin, stem, split, knot, and bullion stitches on plain weave
signed: "O.T.M. Alumna da Escola de N S do Terco e Caridade 13-2-82" (Alumna of the School of Our Lady of Charity)
inscribed: "O.T.M. Alumna da Escola de N S do Terco e Caridade 13-2-82" (Alumna of the School of Our Lady of Charity)
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 41 x 51 cm (16 1/8 x 20 1/16 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: A vase of flowers and the inscription "O.T.M. Alumna da Escola de N S do Terço e Caridade 13-2-82" (Alumna of the School of Our Lady of Charity)

1782. Medium: silk and metal wrapped-silk thread embroidery, silk foundation
